Summary: disc shaped object drove down the street like a car, then soared in front os an shot out into the sky
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around May 15th 1964
divs: sighting details it was in about 55 or 56. i was about 12 and ,i and a friend opened the door to my parents house and stepped onto the porch. he looked right and said" that car is haulin ass". i looked left and about 2 blocks away a "car " was tearing down the street. it was very bright ,with headlights approx. 1\2 the width of the vehicle ,and very bright. it was silent , perhaps humming, . when it got a bout 50 feet away, it went up in the air about 10 feet. then it quickly shot up at a steep angle and climbed into the sky. i walked out to the street and it climbed into the sky ,got smaller and smaller, and then was gone. i ran to the front door to see if my parents saw anything. neither was in the living room. they were in the kitchen with no view. we ran to the street .looking for someone to talk about the object to. there was no one there. the streets were empty. that is when we both knew, we could not talk about it. no proof, and we would have been called idiots.
